item.title: 10 PRINT6502
item.description: BBC Micro machine code take on C64 10 Print one line random pattern generator. Code at Github 10print.asm 10 PRINT 6502 \ 10 PRINT \ Using BeebASM assembler \ (c) Alastair Montgomery INCLUDE "../lib/constants.asm" seed = &70 ORG &2000 .start LDA #23 STA seed LDA #63 STA seed+1 LDX #0 .char LDA chartable, X JSR oswrch INX CPX #23 BNE char .loop JSR random BMI two .one LDA #224 JMP print .

item.title: 10 PRINT
item.description: BBC Micro take on C64 10 Print one line random pattern generator. 10 MODE 0 20 N=RND(1):IF N > 0.5 THEN PRINT "/"; ELSE PRINT "\"; 30 GOTO 20 RUN pic.twitter.com/xQag2GKwx0 — @bbcmicrobot@mastodon.me.uk (@bbcmicrobot) September 4, 2020
